articles.title: South Africa vs Bangladesh Live Score, World Cup 2023: 200 up for Bangladesh, Mahmudullah inching towards a century - The Indian Express
articles.description: South Africa vs Bangladesh Highlights, Cricket World Cup 2023: South Africa nab their fourth win from five games and rise to second on the points table. Bangladesh on the other hand have lost their fourth straight game, having registered a win in their first.

articles.title: Air conditioner ownership in India increased 3-fold since 2010 due to rising heat - Hindustan Times
articles.description: By 2050, India’s total electricity demand from residential air conditioners in the current policy scenario will exceed total consumption in the whole of Africa | Latest News India
